text: aur jab ve eemaan laanevaale se milate hai to kahate hain, "ham bhee eemaan rakhate hain", aur jab aapas mein ek-doosare se ekaant mein milate hai to kahate hai, "kya tum unhen ve baaten, jo allaah ne tum par kholee, bata dete ho ki ve unake dvaara tumhaare rab ke yahaan hujjat mein tumhaara muqaabila karen? to kya tum samajhate nahin
